title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 49.4 - Separability provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 49.4 - Separability provisions

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held unauthorized by law, the remainder of the Part and the application of such provision to other persons or circumstances shall not be affected thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
49.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
